extends Object

        public List<org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact> resolve(org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact artifact,
                                                          boolean transitive,
                                                          List<String> exclusions)
        Resolve the given artifact.
        Parameters:
        artifact - the artifact
        transitive - whether or not the transitive dependencies needs to be resolved too
        exclusions - the list of exclusions
        Returns:
        the list of artifact

      • customizeRemoteRepoBuilder

        public void customizeRemoteRepoBuilder(org.eclipse.aether.repository.RemoteRepository.Builder builder)

      • resolve

        public List<org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact> resolve(String gacv,
                                                          ResolutionOptions options)
        Description copied from interface: Resolver
        Resolves a dependency.
        Specified by:
        resolve in interface Resolver
        Parameters:
        gacv - the dependency, using the GACV form.
        options - the resolution options
        Returns:
        the list of resolved artifacts. The list contains a single element if the transitive dependencies are not resolved. The first artifact of the list if the artifact for the given dependency.
